TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Articles.Content: I'd like my name changed from ExtremeTrader to asdfCYBER please, I'm neither extreme nor a trader and I use asdfCYBER everywhere now. Thanks!

>

> I'd like my name changed from ExtremeTrader to asdfCYBER please, I'm neither extreme nor a trader and I use asdfCYBER everywhere now. Thanks!
>

I came back from the grave to ask...why are there 3 posts in front of my original <abbr title="1. Original Post(er). The first post in a thread, or the person who posted it. 2. Overpowered. A part or mechanic that upsets game balance by being too powerful.">OP</abbr> for this thread? It's really confusing lol
The answer to that question is lost in the mists of time.

Aww. Makes me sad, my only sticky isn't mine anymore lol. Oh well, I'm guessing it got merged with Souper's request to have his name changed. Even though there were a lot of one off threads asking for names changes before I made mine, the point was to consolidate them lol, which it seems to have done.
